entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY
RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLDER WITH LOWS 10 TO 15

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 10 TO 15

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT

SNOW LIKELY
LIGHT SNOW ACCUMULATION POSSIBLE
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
